comments:
While verifying bug 82498, i got multiple times an NPE in
RemoteAntDebugBuildListener.
I have no real test case, I was using 'run to line' over breakpoints, and/or in
position where the line would not be hit again, and some times (1 of 5-10
times), I got this exception.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.debug.core 4 120 2005-01-25 11:24:56.26
!MESSAGE An exception occurred while dispatching debug events.
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at
org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.debug.model.RemoteAntDebugBuildListener.handleBreakpoint(RemoteAntDebugBuildListener.java:250)
        at
org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.debug.model.AntDebugTarget.breakpointRemoved(AntDebugTarget.java:238)
        at
org.eclipse.debug.ui.actions.RunToLineHandler.cancel(RunToLineHandler.java:113)
        at
org.eclipse.debug.ui.actions.RunToLineHandler.handleDebugEvents(RunToLineHandler.java:83)
        at
org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin$EventNotifier.run(DebugPlugin.java:1046)
        at
org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.run(InternalPlatform.java:1051)
        at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:747)
        at
org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin$EventNotifier.dispatch(DebugPlugin.java:1078)
        at
org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin$EventDispatchJob.run(DebugPlugin.java:337)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:66)

Looks like we are cancelling the run to line after termination has occurred 
(fTarget is null).

Forgot to say that when this problem occurs, the 'skip all breakpoints' is not
reset.

Fixed in RemoteAntDebugBuildListener to ignore the removeBreakpoint if the 
target is null (the listener has been shutdown).

Also try/finally in RunToLineHandler to ensure the breakpoint manager is 
correctly "restored"

Verified.
Please update the build notes, Darin S.
